name: guardian-ai-platform
description: Unified runner for Guardian AI Platform

scripts.install:all: npm install --prefix Frontend/Register/sign-in && npm install --prefix Frontend/Register/user-register && npm install --prefix Frontend/Profile/user-profile && npm install --prefix Frontend/Profile/advocate-profile && npm install --prefix Frontend/Chat/chat-user && npm install --prefix Frontend/Chat/chat-advocate
scripts.dev: concurrently -n "BACKEND,SIGNIN,SIGNUP,PROFILE-U,PROFILE-A,CHAT-U,CHAT-A" -c "green,blue,magenta,cyan,red,yellow,white" "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:signin" "npm run dev:signup" "npm run dev:profile" "npm run dev:advocate-profile" "npm run dev:chat-user" "npm run dev:chat-advocate"
